connect20/latest_news_notifier.name: connect20/latest_news_notifier

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/latest_news_notifier.description: Latest News Notifier is an awesome Module which allows you to display your latest news title with a smooth fading effect. Latest News Notifier provides a simple way to present news on your website, one at a time, through Jquery effect.
